New Review of Zuba's Durand Translation

27 Apr 2018

A new review has been published of Elizabeth Zuba’s recent translation of Anouck Durand’s “Eternal Friendship.” Read the review in the Santa Fe New Mexican.

Elizabeth is also the author of the magnificent Decoherent The Wing’ed (SLT, 2016).
